summary: The document is a payroll certification for the Select Committee on Assassinations of the U.S. House of Representatives, covering the accounting period from 02/01/77 to 02/28/77. It details employees' names, positions, social security numbers, pay schedules, annual gross salaries, and pay periods, alongside information on salary limits, allowance amounts, and the office payroll summary.
key_findings: The document provides a detailed list of employees, their positions, and salaries within the Select Committee on Assassinations.
It includes information on the financial management system, payroll certification, and accounting period.
The document also outlines the maximum number of employees, clerks, and professionals authorized, along with the total appropriation and expenditures.
